/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. The trees, with their verdant leaves, stand tall and proud, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. 

On the right side of the street, a fence runs parallel to the road, perhaps marking the boundary of a property or a park. The fence, like a silent sentinel, guides the viewer's eye along the length of the street.

The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The absence of any text or people in the image further enhances the peaceful and quiet ambiance of the scene.

The image is captured from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective to the viewer. It emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky.

Overall, the image beautifully captures a typical day on a street in Beijing, showcasing the city's natural beauty and tranquility amidst its urban setting.
